content: I've been thinking about my grandma a lot lately. It's been two months since she passed away, and I'm still trying to process my emotions. I've been feeling angry with God for taking her away from us, but at the same time, I've been experiencing these vivid dreams that make me feel comforted and at peace. Do you think these dreams could be signs from God or just my subconscious mind trying to cope with my loss?
